name: gringo
description: Real-time social networking application with Express, React, and Socket.IO

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run docs"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../clients/Web && npm install && cd ../docs && npm install
scripts.prod:start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd clients/docs && serve -s build -l 3002"
